item.title: How many transactions does it take to delete 1000 entities in Azure Table Storage?
item.description: Any type of operation against the storage is counted as a transaction, including reads, writes, and deletes. It takes 2000 transactions to delete 1000 entities. Explore in Azure Monitoring You can observe this in Azure Monitor, try deleting a How much does it cost? With entity groups Trivia: You can icnclude up to 100 entities in an entity group transaction. Caveat This is as per 17th june 2020
